The Serial number, GTIN or Barcode: The Serial number, GTIN or Barcode
This sets a readable URL for the product: This sets a readable URL for the product
Allow free form comments when adding pro: Allow free form comments when adding products to cart
Tag words used to indexed products, maki: Tag words used to indexed products, making them easier to find and filter.
Setting_tag_link_explain: Here you can add and remove categories from the categories menu.
Setting_menu_explain: Here you can configure a menu to display on your shopping cart. You can use this menu to filter your products by specifying a keyword in the "link" field. For example: to display products with a boot keyword (or tag), set the menu field to "Backpacks" and a link value of "backpack". You can also use this menu to link to static pages, for example: shipping, returns, help, about, contact etc.
Setting_ig_explain:
Here you can manage which IG posts will be displayed on the landing page. 
 To add / edit the displayed posts, just open the desired Instagram post with a browser and copy and paste the input URL.
Products can be filtered by: product tit: Products can be filtered by: product title or product description keywords
Here you can set variants for your produ: Here you can set variants for your product. Eg: Size, color, style
Orders can be filtered by: surname, emai: Orders can be filtered by: surname, email address or postcode/zipcode
Reviews can be filtered by: review title: Reviews can be filtered by: review title or review description keywords
Name: Name
Customers can be filtered by: email, nam: Customers can be filtered by: email, name or phone number
This element is critical for search engi: This element is critical for search engine optimisation. Cart title is displayed if your logo is hidden.
This description shows when your website: This description shows when your website is listed in search engine results.

This is used as the \"from\" email when: This is used as the "from" email when sending receipts to your customers.
Set this to your currency symbol. Eg: $,: Set this to your currency symbol. Eg: $, £, €

The number of products to be displayed o: The number of products to be displayed on each page.
